name: Sonicball
description: It's fast, it's fun, it's the coolest game on the block, it's Sonicball!! Try to get more points than your rival, aka Dark Sonic. Deflect the ball, and get it into your rival's goal. Destroy your rival in Boss Mode (coming soon!). Inspired by Scratchball. Sonic is owned by Sega. This is a not-for-profit fangame.
